html: Those who smote and slew Jehovah’s covenant people—before and during his Day of Judgment—end up worse off than those whom they persecuted. As according to the terms of Jehovah’s covenant the curses of the covenant come upon those who violate the rights of his people who keep the terms of his covenant, those who attempt to annihilate Jehovah’s people are themselves annihilated in his Day of Judgment. The “fierce blasts” and “east wind” apply initially to the archtyrant who destroys the wicked and lastly to Jehovah’s servant who delivers the righteous (Isaiah 17:12-14; 29:5-6; 57:13).
